name.japanese: エニエス・ロビー正門

description: The main entrance gate to Enies Lobby, guarded by two giants, Kashii and Oimo. This is the first major obstacle for anyone attempting to breach the World Government's judicial island.

keyEvents.title: Franky Family and Galley-La Attack Kashii
keyEvents.description: The Franky Family and Galley-La Company launch a coordinated attack against the giant guard Kashii at the main gate.
keyEvents.significance: The beginning of the breach of Enies Lobby's defenses.

keyEvents.title: Kashii Defeated
keyEvents.description: Through combined efforts, the allied forces defeat the giant guard Kashii.
keyEvents.significance: The first major victory in breaching Enies Lobby's defenses.

statusHistory.reason: Main gate of Enies Lobby remains operational

description: The central tower of Enies Lobby where the CP9 agents gather and where prisoners are judged before being sent through the Gates of Justice. This is where Spandam's office is located and where CP9 holds their meetings.

keyEvents.title: CP9 First Reunion in Five Years
keyEvents.description: The CP9 agents gather together for the first time in five years at the Tower of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: Important reunion establishing CP9's dynamics and relationships.

keyEvents.title: Fukurou's Te-awase Debut
keyEvents.description: Fukurou demonstrates his Te-awase technique to measure doriki levels.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of the doriki measurement system.

keyEvents.title: Rob Lucci's Doriki: 4000
keyEvents.description: Rob Lucci is revealed to have 4000 doriki, the highest of all CP9 agents.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes Lucci as the strongest CP9 member and primary antagonist.

statusHistory.reason: Tower remains operational as CP9 headquarters
